entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
